doc:
Scatman Crothers https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scatman_Crothers 0 Benjamin Sherman Crothers (May 23, 1910 – November 22, 1986), known as Scatman Crothers, was an American actor, singer, dancer and musician known for his work as Louie the Garbage Man on the TV show Chico and the Man and as Dick Hallorann in Stanley Kubrick's The Shining (1980). He was also a prolific voiceover artist, and provided the voices of Meadowlark Lemon in the Harlem Globetrotters' animated TV series, Jazz the Autobot in The Transformers and The Transformers: The Movie (1986), the title character in Hong Kong Phooey and Scat Cat in the animated Disney film The Aristocats (1970). Benjamin_Sherman_Crothers ( May_23_,_1910 – November_22_,_1986 ) , known as Scatman_Crothers , was an_American_actor , singer , dancer_and_musician known for his_work as Louie the_Garbage_Man on the_TV_show_Chico and the_Man and as Dick_Hallorann in Stanley_Kubrick 's_The_Shining ( 1980 ) . He was also a_prolific_voiceover_artist , and provided the_voices of Meadowlark_Lemon in the_Harlem_Globetrotters '_animated_TV_series , Jazz the_Autobot in The_Transformers and The_Transformers : The_Movie_(_1986_) , the_title_character in Hong_Kong_Phooey and Scat_Cat in the_animated_Disney_film The_Aristocats ( 1970_) .
